page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: There is one private school and seven state schools in our area. There is no Secondary Education here but children travel to nearby Secondary Moderns or Grammars.{Buckinghamshire is one of {the few areas in the country to still {operate a selective system of {education.}At 12 they sit an entrance examination for a grammar school. If they don't pass they have to go to a Secondary Modern. Many children in the area do not use the State or Free Education. They travel to{Private schools in Gerrards Cross and Beaconsfield. I am at a Private school in Gerrard's Cross. Some of my friends board as their parents work abroad. At 12 we sit a Common Entrance examination for entry to our next school. The fees for a Day Girl are Â£650 per term.
